        public Player FindPlayer(java.lang.String strName,
                         int intMin,
                         int intMax)
        Binary search method that finds the requested player from the playerList
        Specified by:
        FindPlayer in interface GameManager
        Parameters:
        strName - if the username of the player that we are looking for
        intMin - is the minimum index of the window that we are examining
        intMax - is the maximum index of the window that we are examining
        Returns:
        the player that has the username that is being looked for
